Type: spec
Substitute: kiwi package
Substitute: kiwi-packagemanager:instsource package
Ignore: package:bash
Ignore: package:cups

%if %{_cross_sb2_enabled}
SB2install: sb2-tools-%{_my_port_arch}-inject
SB2flags: --toolchain %{_my_port_crosscompiler} --qemu %{_my_port_qemu} --mappingmethod C --defaultmode obs-rpm-build+pp
Required: sb2-tools-%{_my_port_arch}-dependency-inject
Hostarch: i586
%endif
